go_data.justification: Chromatin unloading of the replicative helicase at the end of replication involves K48-linked MCM7 poly-ubiquitylation.
Chromatin unloading of the replicative helicase at the end of replication involves K48-linked MCM7 poly-ubiquitylation.
MCM7 is involved in DNA replication, which occurs in the nucleus.
